# Zalesie, Gmina Wartkowice

Zalesie  is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Wartkowice, within Poddębice County, Łódź Voivodeship, in central Poland. It lies approximately  west of Wartkowice,  north of Poddębice, and  north-west of the regional capital Łódź.
